headline: How Weak Core Growth and Acquisition Dependence Could Reshape Nordson’s (NDSN) Investment Narrative
summary: In recent analysis, Nordson Corporation’s core business was shown to be underperforming, with weak organic revenue over the past two years and earnings per share growth lagging industry peers. The study also highlighted diminishing returns on capital, raising questions about whether Nordson must rely more heavily on acquisitions to sustain its growth ambitions. We’ll now explore how concerns about Nordson’s slowing organic growth and reliance on acquisitions could affect its previously...
